content.rendered:
beauty bar in pickering | THE TEN SPOT®

welcome to 10spot® beauty bar in pickering. our team is full of skilled experts who know how to make you look and feel your best! we offer a variety of services like waxing, facials, nail care, and laser hair removal. when you visit us, our awesome team will set you on track to taking the steps to feeling #likeATen®

book now!
gift certificates
buy a series
buy a membership
newsletter sign-up
beauty bar in pickering | THE TEN SPOT®
  • 820 kingston road, pickering, ontario
  • 905-837-6666
  • pickering@thetenspot.com

Hours

mon. - wed: 10:00 am – 7:00 pm

thu. - fri: 10:00 am – 8:00 pm

sat.: 9:00 am – 6:00 pm

sun.: 10:00 am – 5:00 pm

our beauty bar services

nails

we offer the best mani pedi in town! we offer nail extensions, gel nails, pedicures, and many more.

See services menu

waxing

we offer top notch waxing services designed to make you #feellikeaten like our brazilly®, thongkini®, general full body waxing, and much more.

See services menu

facials

our team has serious skills when it comes to facial treatments. we offer stress-free facial procedures like anti-aging facials, dermaplaning, chemical peels, and many more.

See services menu

brows

what better way to spoil yourself than by getting your brows and lashes done. wether you’re looking for lash lifts, brow lams, or more, we do it all.

See services menu

laser

hair removal can be tricky, thats why we make it simple with our awesome lineup of laser hair removal treatments like our bikini laser, full body laser, and much more.

See services menu
book now at this location

Check out our awesome reviews!

The facility is super clean and the staff is professional! Had a great experience with my wax from Jyoti. She took her time to get all the hairs, was very fun to talk to, and ensured I was comfortable. Highly recommend.
stephanie clar
1720974086
Love this place! Ten Spot is definitely my go to. Super convenient and always has parking. Clean and bright. Staff are fantastic… Especially Jyoti.
Raquel Fanugao
1720729893
I saw the reviews and loved to give it a try, I believe this is one of the best decisions ever. I was skeptical about changing my salon and I used to drive to Toronto to enjoy the great services of my usual salon, I came here and regret not coming... earlier. The place is very clean and the staff members are very friendly. I had the absolute pleasure to meet Snehal and Simar and loved every minute of my time and every detail of my experience. Service was great, and I felt so pampered, I highly recommend The Ten Spot for everyone seeking great service. Best of luck, great staff 🙂read more
Inas Hamid
1719340876
Love this place and the talented women who work here!Jyoti is the queen of eyebrows and lashes! Also making me feel more like myself after each appointment. Not only is she talented at her craft she is kind, funny, and warm during our... appointments.Highly highly recommended spending your time and money with her at the Ten Spot Pickering!read more
Maggie Stein
1719258243
Super service. I came in inquiring about a last minute appointment, and not only was Jyoti able to get me in, the service was hands down the best I've had in years. Working in the spa industry for years I've been looking for a new wax specialist who... meets my high standards, and I am VERY pleasantly surprised. I will be back for more services in the Jyoti in the near future!read more
Maryellen MacGregor
1718741613
Jyoti was PHENOMENAL!!!! She and Simar were a breathe of fresh air. Professional but so warm and friendly. They took so much pride in their work. They didn’t even mind refilling the heels a bit more until I was fully happy. Jyoti was very gentle... with my elderly mom who had a badly sprained ankle. 10 outta 10 for Pickering 10 Spot!!!!read more
Anisa Morris
1715386447
My first experience here was unfortunate, mostly because their menu online did not match with their services in-person. There was also major miscommunication when I arrived and realized they couldn’t get my gels removed.They do not do gels here, I... would recommend confirming your service before showing up.Though, after I left with no service, the staff tried to make it right by following up which was very gracious.After getting my nails done there, the staff were very kind to try to make their customers happy and satisfied.read more
Rachael
1713609208
I went for a Brazilian and eye brow tint and thread with Jyoti and she was great! She took her time and the final results were amazing! She even recommended a great product for me. Thanks again!
Joanne Fischer
1713139897
My recent visit to this beauty bar was truly delightful, thanks to the outstanding service provided by Jyoti. From the moment I stepped in, her warm and welcoming demeanor instantly put me at ease. Not only did she attentively address all my... concerns and preferences, but her patience and skill were also evident throughout the appointment. Her expertise and precision in nail care were impressive, leaving me very satisfied with the results (I got so many compliments!). Her professionalism and dedication to customer satisfaction were amazing, making my experience truly memorable. Without a doubt, I highly recommend Jyoti to anyone looking for a beautiful manicure.read more
yasmine el-bakri
1712350126
SHERRI WAS AMAZING! It was my first visit to Ten Spot and only my second time waxing in over a decade. Not only was she super fast, but her technique was outstanding and it wasn't even what I would consider painful. The location was spotless and... just overall above expectations. I will be back next month for sure! Thank you, Sherri!read more
Laura Parker
1712156274
I’ve been coming here for a while now and I’ve only had good experiences! I recently got waxed by Jyoti and she exceeded my already high expectations! I never had such a painless wax. She even took the time to ensure the hair removal was thorough... and gentle. I definitely recommend her servicesread more
Sujaane
1710610084
I got my first Brazilian wax this past week with Sherri and my experience was great! I highly recommend that if you are a first time waxer, you book with Sherri. She made the process as comfortable as possible and was super nice & attentive! Thank... you Sherri 🙂read more
Valen Subramaniam
1710573311
I recently visited this location, and I was impressed by how clean and well-maintained it was. All the staff members were friendly and knowledgeable about the services offered. My aesthetician, Jyoti, was particularly amazing. She made sure that I... didn't experience much pain during both of my appointments and knew exactly how to handle clients with care and expertise.For Jyoti ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️read more
JK
1710548113
A shout out to Snehal, Sherri and Jyoti for treating my daughters and their friends for birthday manicures! They were accommodating and friendly. The salon is spotless and welcoming. I will be returning soon for myself!Thanks Snehal for the extra... care in scheduling the appointments together.read more
Kathleen Eva
1710528676
I’ve been going to The TEN Spot in Pickering for a while now. It’s a nice, clean, hygienic place. Sherri is my go to person for all my waxing needs. I would highly recommend her! It’s always a good experience at The TEN Spot. Thank you for a... wonderful experience every single time.read more
Sanha Hudda
1709643158
I went to this location a couple of weeks ago and saw Sajia. She was absolutely amazing, did an incredibly thorough job, and was meticulous about getting rid of every unwanted hair (I went for threading). I have always been more than happy with this... location and will definitely be back. The space is clean and inviting, and the staff are amazing. Thank you!read more
Nadine S
1709593693
This was my first time visiting Ten Spot and getting a brazillian done. Overall, I had a really good time! Snehal was great and made the wax procedure as pain free as possible for me. The staff is nice and offered me water or tea while I waited for... my appointment. Would definitely recommend to my friends to come here and am for sure coming back! Thanks 🙂read more
Janice Patena
1709584331
Jyoti is absolutely incredible! I've never encountered anyone quite like her. My experience with her treatment was simply outstanding, truly leaving me in awe. Overall, I give Jyoti and the Tenspot Pickering location a solid 5-star rating. I'm... committed to being a lifelong customer for all my services because of Jyoti's exceptional care. Thank you once again!⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️read more
Gigi Desouza
1708793997
Jyoti was lovely. She took her time with my service and was wonderfully kind in trying to minimize pain form the procedure. I would recommend her specifically. Overall, the location was nice, appeared and felt clean, and was quite comfortable.
Brittini
1708478744
I love working at The Ten Spot, it’s it’s been a great opportunity for me to work with my Coworkers and wonderful guests!!! it hasn’t been too long that I start working at this Location, it’s been only 5 months, but I feel I worked here more... then 5 years. The owner is such a lovely lady, she make me feel like I am with my own family. I would love to continue working at the Ten Spot in this locationThank you so muchread more
sajai noori0908
1708307883
I have worked at this location from opening day. I love my craft and take pride in my work, the Ten Spot has given me the wonderful opportunity to use my skill set! I enjoy the awesome environment of great coworkers and lovely guests:)Special... mention to this Franchise ownerThank you for giving your staff flexibility and trust. 🧡Looking forward to seeing continued growth and abundance at our store.Sherriread more
Sherri Wu
1708296591
This is the only spa I trust with my beauty needs. I have been coming there for the past year. The staff there is always super friendly and they do an amazing job every time! I highly recommend you book with Snehal! She is amazing. She is really... professional and friendly. 10/10!read more
coralie rimaud
1708095207
‹
›
